name: Elixâ„¢ ABS 158I
description: High rubber content Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene modifier used to improve toughness of engineering thermoplastics & PVC. Typical applications: Provides superior impact strength performance at room & low temperature for blends containing Polycarbonate, Polyesters (PBT, PET) and copolymer SAN. Highly effective modifier for improving impact strength, elongation at break and process ability for opaque PVC compounds used for indoor profiles, semi-rigid sheets, decorative films, molded parts. Useful additive to improve mechanical properties of recycle ABS, SAN and ABS+PC.
